jPokémon: The Pokémon API

Provides well-documented data structures and utilities for Pokémon games written in Java.
 Overview  Package  Class  Use 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

jPokémon: The Pokémon API

Version 20130309-1755 (Alpha)

Pokémon
org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon Provides the classes related to Pokémon themselves.
org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon.ability Provides the classes related to Pokémon abilities.
org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon.evolution Provides classes related to a Pokémon's potential evolution path.
org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon.nature Provides classes related to a Pokémon's nature attribute, including the 25 classic natures.

 

Types
org.jpokemon.pmapi.type Provides classes that define the types available for Pokémon moves and species.

 

Moves, Items and Trainers
org.jpokemon.pmapi.item Provides classes related to in-game items used by the player.
org.jpokemon.pmapi.move Provides classes related to in-game moves learned and used by Pokémon.
org.jpokemon.pmapi.trainer  

 

Miscellaneous
org.jpokemon.pmapi.util Provides miscellaneous classes and enums related to minor Pokémon attributes such as stats, tastes, and so on.

 

Other Packages
org.jpokemon.pmapi
